0.user_question: Six witches and ten sorcerers are at an arcane mixer. The witches have decided to shake hands with each of the sorcerers. None of the witches bothered to shake each other's hands, since they are all good friends already, and the sorcerers all sort of hate each other and did not shake hands with other sorcerers. How many handshakes took place at the mixer?

ost_step.1: Each witch shakes hands with every sorcerer, so each witch makes 10 handshakes.
ost_step.2: There are 6 witches, so there are $6\times10=60$ handshakes between witches and sorcerers.
ost_step.3: Since no handshakes took place between sorcerers, there were no additional handshakes.
ost_step.4: Therefore, a total of $\boxed{60}$ handshakes took place at the mixer.
